name: Aayushi Jain
headline: Change-Maker | NSUT CSE'26 | Web Dev | 427K+ Impressions | UI/UX | GenAI | 3X Hackathon Winner
about:
- 3X Hackathon Winner- Tech Journey Featured in Penguin Random House Publication's Book: by Rupangi Sharma- Represented India at Sirius Centre, Sochi, Russia- Proficient in Web Development, Generative AI, UI/UX Development- Worked at Adobe as a UI/UX intern creating TechBus (an app to improve school transport)- Tech Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Gemini API, NextJS, Python- Love writing code for startups and looking for similar opportunities- Ghostwriter for LinkedIn Accounts (Hit me up if you want to increase your reach on LinkedIn)- Building Ashjin, Personal LinkedIn Branding Agency aiming to help people find their right audience on  LinkedIn-Love communicating my ideas on DSA, internships, interviews and college life. My goal is to enhance my knowledge, gain technical expertise and one day be a startup founder. My perennial source of inspiration is Steve Jobs and I wish I find a team and garage one day like him.- 3X Hackathon Winner
- Tech Journey Featured in Penguin Random House Publication's Book: by Rupangi Sharma
- Represented India at Sirius Centre, Sochi, Russia
- Proficient in Web Development, Generative AI, UI/UX Development
- Worked at Adobe as a UI/UX intern creating TechBus (an app to improve school transport)
- Tech Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Gemini API, NextJS, Python
- Love writing code for startups and looking for similar opportunities
- Ghostwriter for LinkedIn Accounts (Hit me up if you want to increase your reach on LinkedIn)
- Building Ashjin, Personal LinkedIn Branding Agency aiming to help people find their right audience on 
   LinkedIn
-Love communicating my ideas on DSA, internships, interviews and college life. 

My goal is to enhance my knowledge, gain technical expertise and one day be a startup founder. My perennial source of inspiration is Steve Jobs and I wish I find a team and garage one day like him.

projects.description: An app which improves the efficiency of the school transport system and increases the security of the school students through a variety of features.
Associated with Atal Innovation Mission Official

In this project, I 3D modelled various kinds of houses. Compact houses for the city, night shelters for the poor and shape changeable houses. If such houses are introduced in market then it would prove to be highly beneficial for the over populated metro cities in India.

projects.duration: In this project we created a working model with various units which provide easy handling of waste produced in schools and converts 90% of the waste into a resource.
